enableConditions.logic: 1 AND (2 OR 3 OR 4 OR 5 OR 6 OR (7 AND 8))

action.label: if esc feature flag is enabled

skuid__text.contents:
Skuid may use any one of the following static IP addresses to connect directly to your data source.

If this data source utilizes a firewall, these IP addresses may need to be trusted:

While Skuid will not provide SSL certificate information, it will accept encrypted data from servers that send SSL information in their responses. However, it will also retrieve data unencrypted if no certificate is returned.
After the initial SSL handshake, Skuid will encrypt queries and responses using the certificate information below. If the certificate information does not match, the queries will fail.

skuid__text.contents:
Here you can save the values you've entered for these fields as environment variables. We've pre-filled their names, but you can change them to ensure they match variables you may have in other environments.

For more information, see our environment variables documentation.

skuid__text.contents: Once you click Save, we'll save your data source and any selected variables.
